presentationTable.name: Facts - Analytics Currency
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend

presentationColumns.name: # of New Active Subscriptions
presentationColumns.description: The number of New Subscriptions started in a period. (started in a period and which are not a result of an amendment, suspension, or renewal of existing subscriptions)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.# of New Active Subscriptions

presentationColumns.name: # of Renewed Active Subscriptions
presentationColumns.description: The number of Subscriptions Renewed in a period. (number of active subscriptions that are renewed from existing subscriptions)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.# of Renewed Active Subscriptions

presentationColumns.name: # of Terminated Subscriptions
presentationColumns.description: The number of Subscriptions Terminated in a period. (number of active subscriptions that are terminated in a period. This metric does not include closed subscriptions due to the amendment or suspension of existing subscriptions)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.# of Terminated Subscriptions

presentationColumns.name: # of New Customers
presentationColumns.description: The number of New Customers added in a period (Customers who started an active subscription in a given period)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.# of New Customers

presentationColumns.name: MRR Due for Renewal
presentationColumns.description: The total MRR of Subscriptions that are due for Renewal in a period
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.MRR Due for Renewal in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: New Active MRR
presentationColumns.description: The total new MRR of Active subscriptions added in a period (started in a period and which are not a result of an amendment, suspension, or renewal of existing subscriptions)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.New Active MRR In Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Expansion MRR
presentationColumns.description: The total Expansion MRR in a period (The difference in MRR between a target and source of an amendment relationship where the target MRR greater than Source MRR and the target start date falls within this period and not in Draft)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Expansion MRR in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Contraction MRR
presentationColumns.description: The total Contraction MRR in a period(The difference in MRR between a target and source of an amendment relationship where the target MRR less than Source MRR and the target start date falls within this period and not in Draft)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Contraction MRR in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Activated Renewal MRR
presentationColumns.description: The total Activated Renewal MRR in a period (Active Subscriptions that were renewed from existing subscriptions)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Activated Renewal MRR in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Churned Renewal MRR
presentationColumns.description: The total Churned Renewal MRR in a period (Subscriptions that were Renewed from existing Subscriptions but Canceled in the given period)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Churned Renewal MRR in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Lapsed Renewal MRR
presentationColumns.description: The total Lapsed Renewal MRR in a period(Active subscriptions that expired in a period without being renewed)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Lapsed Renewal MRR in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Termination MRR
presentationColumns.description: The total Termination MRR in a period (Active subscriptions that are closed in a period, not due to the amendment or suspension of existing subscriptions)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Termination MRR in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Absolute MRR Churn
presentationColumns.description: The Absolute MRR Churn. This metric is calculated as follows:(Lapsed Renewal MRR+ Termination MRR + Churned Renewal MRR)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Absolute MRR Churn in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: MRR Churn Rate %
presentationColumns.description: The MRR Churn Rate. This metric is calculated as follows: 100*(Lapsed Renewal MRR + Termination MRR  + Churned Renewal MRR) / Active MRR (Period Start)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.MRR Churn Rate % in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Net Revenue Retention Rate %
presentationColumns.description: The Net Revenue Retention Rate. This metric is calculated as follows: 100* Active MRR (Period End) / Active MRR (Period Start)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Net Revenue Retention Rate % in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: MRR Renewal Rate %
presentationColumns.description: The MRR Renewal Rate. This metric is calculated as follows: 100* Activated Renewal MRR / MRR due for Renewal (Period End)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.MRR Renewal Rate % in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: MRR Lapsed Renewal %
presentationColumns.description: The MRR Lapsed Renewal Rate. This metric is calculated as follows: 100*Lapsed Renewal MRR/Active MRR (Period start)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.MRR Lapsed Renewal % in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: # of Churned Customers
presentationColumns.description: The number of Customers Churned in a period (Customers whose active subscriptions were all terminated or expired without renewal in a given period)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.# of Churned Customers

presentationColumns.name: Customers Churn Rate %
presentationColumns.description: The Customer Churn Rate. This metric is calculated as follows: # of Churned Customers /# of Active Customers (period start)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Customers Churn Rate %
